name: Rise and Shine (Rykuzu Studios)
description:
*Important tip: It would be best to manually click to shoot for a certain amount of time before holding and shooting. It could really go a long way.*

Watch your temperature because it goes down really fast. In order to regain some of some body heat, you must go to the crate and press F.

Controls:

WASD Movement

Left Click: Shoot laser(Must be within range)

Spacebar: Reload your ammo once you run out.

F: Heat up your characters body temperature(Must be within range of the crate)

The winter solstice is approaching and you need to make sure to prepare. Your goal is to use the laser given to fire at the moon in order for the sun to rise and make the days longer. Are you up for the task?

This game jam was made in 3 hours for the FNGJ with the theme: Winter Solstice.

Credits:

Song used:

Strike the Earth(Plains of Passage) - Shovel Knight OST by Jake Kaufman

Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds

Casual Game Sounds: Dustyroom

All other art and programming was made by me.
